search.query: | tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_DISK where (nodename = DISK_Data_Types.DISKRIOWRIO) ($osfilter$) groupby "DISK_Data_Types.frameID" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "DISK_Data_Types.frameID" | sort limit=0 "DISK_Data_Types.frameID" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields "DISK_Data_Types.frameID"

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_DISK where (nodename = DISK_Data_Types.DISKRIOWRIO) (DISK_Data_Types.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) groupby "DISK_Data_Types.hostname", "DISK_Data_Types.device" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "DISK_Data_Types.hostname", "DISK_Data_Types.device" | sort limit=0 "DISK_Data_Types.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields DISK_Data_Types.hostname | dedup DISK_Data_Types.hostname | sort DISK_Data_Types.hostname

| tstats count AS Count from datamodel=NMON_Data_DISK where (nodename = DISK_Data_Types.DISKRIOWRIO) (DISK_Data_Types.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) groupby "DISK_Data_Types.hostname", "DISK_Data_Types.device" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t count AS Count by "DISK_Data_Types.hostname", "DISK_Data_Types.device" | sort limit=0 "DISK_Data_Types.hostname" | fields - _span | fillnull Count | fields DISK_Data_Types.device | dedup DISK_Data_Types.device | sort DISK_Data_Types.device

table.title: DISKRIO - Disk Read I/O per second

search.query: | tstats max("DISK_Data_Types.value") AS DISK_Data_Types.value from datamodel=NMON_Data_DISK where (nodename = DISK_Data_Types.DISKRIOWRIO) (DISK_Data_Types.type=DISKRIO) (DISK_Data_Types.hostname=$hostname-prefilter$) ($frameID$) ($osfilter$) ($hostname$) ($device$) groupby _time, "DISK_Data_Types.hostname", "DISK_Data_Types.device" prestats=true | stats dedup_splitvals=t max("DISK_Data_Types.value") AS DISK_Data_Types.value by _time, "DISK_Data_Types.hostname", "DISK_Data_Types.device" | $aggregate$ | rename "DISK_Data_Types.hostname" AS hostname, "DISK_Data_Types.device" AS device, "DISK_Data_Types.value" AS value | stats max(value) AS max_value, avg(value) AS avg_value, min(value) AS min_value, sparkline($statsmode$(value)) As sparkline by "hostname", "device" | sort limit=0 "hostname" | eval value=round(value,2) | fields hostname,device,max_value, avg_value, min_value,sparkline | eval avg_value=round(avg_value,2)
